name: Gravity Assist (Ashelgard)
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Jump

(Be sure to hold down Space to jump farther)

Press DOWN and JUMP at the same time while on a warp pad to use it.

There are 3 levels, plus an extra (very difficult) level that is half-finished.

Texture Assets from: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/simplified-platformer-pack
